nodes.text: Maykia Grell  was a female Sarkhai from the planet of the same name who married an explorer named Tobas Grell early in her lifetime. Maykia's husband gave up his dangerous career when she became pregnant with their first child, but Maykia died while giving birth to their daughter in 3662 BBY, a girl whom Tobas named Nadia according to his wife's wishes.
Maykia Grell was first mentioned in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia's entry for Tobas Grell.
